Method Detail

manageThesaurus

public void manageThesaurus()
Method manageThesaurus Choose one of the following options: 1) Import a UNL thesaurus 2) Import and translate a thesaurus 3) Translate a thesarus 4) Delete a thesaurus 5) Quit

delete

public void delete()
Method delete Deletes the WHOLE thesaurus. No turning back (after saying yes).

importOnly

public void importOnly()
Method importOnly Imports a thesaurus using the class ThesaurusImport

translate

public void translate()
Method translate Translates a thesaurus using the class ThesaurusTranslation

translateImport

public void translateImport()
Method translateImport Translates a thesaurus using the class ThesaurusTranslation. Then imports the thesaurus using the class ThesaurusImport.

translateImport

private void translateImport(java.lang.Boolean translation,
                             java.lang.Boolean importation)
Method translateImport Translates a thesaurus using the class ThesaurusTranslation. Then imports the thesaurus using the class ThesaurusImport. To be called via the wrappers translate(), importOnly(), translateImport().

translation

private void translation(java.lang.String inFilePath,
                         java.lang.String outFilePath,
                         Language language,
                         int languagewidth)
Method translation Calls upon ThesaurusTranslation for translation.

importUNL

private void importUNL(java.lang.String path,
                       java.lang.Boolean create)
Method importUNL Calls upon ThesaurusImport for the import of an UNL thesaurus.

getNumber

private int getNumber()
Method getNumber Reads a number from the user and returns it. In case of error 0 is given back.

getLanguage

private Language getLanguage()
Method getLanguage Reads a language from the user and returns it. In case of error 'null' is given back.

getString

private java.lang.String getString()
Method getString Reads a String from the user and returns it. In case of error 'null' is given back.

getBoolean

private java.lang.Boolean getBoolean()
Method getBoolean Reads a String from the user and return if it is igual to 'y' or 'Y'. In case of error 'false' is given back.
